acceptFight(bytes32,uint256).details: This function gathers all the information necessary to call the startFight() function at `FightExecutor` contract. If successful sets fight state to ONGOING. Otherwise it reverts. Both participants are marked as fighting.

params.fightId: The fightId you want to accept. Retrieved from logs.
params.nftId: The NFT you want to use. The NFT must be yours.

requestFight((uint256,uint256,uint256,ad.details: Sets the fightState of the corresponding fightId to REQUESTED. Locks bet with deadline to the BetsVault. Creates new Fight struct on storage. Sets nftId to isFighting on collection or barracks contracts.

setNftAutomated(uint256,uint256,uint256,.details: Yout must approve linkFunds amount of LINK to the contract before calling this function.

settleFight(bytes32,uint8).details: Function callable by the `FightExecutor` contract to set the state of a finished fight to AVAILABLE. Mark fight participants as "not fighting".     * by setting the fightId assosiated with their addresses to bytes32(0). Set nfts to not fighting in NFT collection or barracks. Also call BetsVault and distribute the bets. If any of the NFT was in automation mode, check if its funds allow him to keep being automated, if not then take it out from the automated NFTs list.

acceptFight(bytes32,uint256).notice: fightId must be in REQUESTED at the beginning of this function execution.

requestFight((uint256,uint256,uint256,ad.notice: Bet == msg.value. For simplicity this protocol only operates with the native coin Ether.msg.sender must be the owner of `nftId`'s NFT.the NFT has to be on the chain at the moment.If requested a fight that anyone can accept, add it to the automated fights system so automated nfts can accept it.

settleFight(bytes32,uint8).notice: Every time called this must hold FightState == ONGOING

documentation.text:
@dev Struct used for preserving fight data
 required for execution but not emitted in logs.

@dev Function callable by the `FightExecutor` contract
 to set the state of a finished fight to AVAILABLE.
 Mark fight participants as "not fighting".     *
 by setting the fightId assosiated with their addresses to bytes32(0).
 Set nfts to not fighting in NFT collection or barracks.
 Also call BetsVault and distribute the bets.
 If any of the NFT was in automation mode, check if its funds allow him to keep being automated,
 if not then take it out from the automated NFTs list.
 @notice Every time called this must hold FightState == ONGOING
@dev Yout must approve linkFunds amount of LINK to the contract before calling this function.
